services.title: A referent mission that
services.subtitle: This referent mission encompasses and coordinates our areas of expertise, which you can also request independently.

service1.title: Strategy, Studies & Diagnostics
service1.description: Build an energy strategy tailored to your assets for a clear and objective vision.
service1.details: Complete inventory (buildings, street lighting, vehicle fleet), consumption analysis and action prioritisation.
service1.example: Rather than renovating at random, we identify the most energy-intensive building in your portfolio to focus your investments where returns are fastest.

service2.title: Monitoring & Consumption Tracking
service2.description: Drive ongoing actions and track the real evolution of your consumption.
service2.details: Setting up simple indicators for elected officials and technicians, regular monitoring and configuration of sustainable management tools.
service2.example: Monthly consumption analysis detects an immediate drift due to a heating misconfiguration, avoiding unnecessary extra costs at year end.

service3.title: Project Owner Assistance (AMO)
service3.description: Concrete actions towards energy sobriety, from strategy to implementation.
service3.details: Support during renovations, HVAC studies (heating, ventilation, air conditioning), low-tech solutions and usage optimisation.
service3.example: When replacing a boiler, we help you validate the system best suited to your needs, ensuring the delivered works match your savings objectives.

service4.title: Regulatory Compliance
service4.description: Secure your organisation against growing legal obligations.
service4.details: Identification of subject assets and compliance with decrees (Eco-energy tertiary/OPERAT, BACS, Energy Efficiency Directive).
service4.example: We handle the annual data entry on the OPERAT platform for the Tertiary Decree, sparing you sanctions and reputational risk from "Name & Shame".

service5.title: Training & Awareness
service5.description: Train your staff in energy management to become autonomous.
service5.details: Awareness sessions on energy management and ecological transition tailored to your context.
service5.example: On-site training to teach your technical teams how to optimise Building Management System (BMS) settings without sacrificing occupant comfort.
